main event: A sighting of an object described as possibly a rocket reentry, characterized by a greenish color with white patterning and zig-zag motion.
interesting points: The sighting was classified as 'very brief.' The object was observed at a significant distance and visible at a specific bearing from the aircraft's position. There is a contention around its classification, with a strong inclination towards it being a fireball rather than reentry debris. The flight characteristics indicated the possibility of it being meteoric in nature.
sighted object: an unidentified object resembling rocket reentry
witness description: an aircraft crew reporting from the area
